article_title: How Governors Trash Their Economies By Micromanaging Business

article_metadata.description: Last week CATO Institute released its biennial Fiscal Report Card on America's Governors, which provides some startling facts that should have voters across the country seriously considering how they vote on November 4 and in the coming years – and, quite possibly, where they will choose to live, operate their businesses, and raise their children.
article_metadata.author: Rex Sinquefield
